user.title: Actron Air ESPHome Configuration
user.description: Configure your Actron Air ESPHome integration. The entity prefix should match your ESPHome device name.

data_description.entity_prefix: The prefix used for your ESPHome entities (e.g., actron_air_esphome)
data_description.zone_count: The number of zones configured in your Actron Air system (1-7)
data_description.current_temperature_sensor: An external temperature sensor to display current room temperature
data_description.humidity_sensor: An external humidity sensor to display current humidity

error.entity_not_found: Could not find ESPHome entities with this prefix. Ensure your ESPHome device is connected and the prefix is correct.

abort.already_configured: This entity prefix is already configured.
